Donate

Please help us now by making a donation. Without you we could not do all we do. You can make a difference now.

[/vc_column_text][tm_button size=”sm” full_wide=”1″ button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fcare4calais.org%2Fdonate-now%2F|title:Donate%20today|target:%20_blank|” animation=”none” icon_type=”fontawesome” icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-external-link” color=”custom” button_bg_color=”custom” font_color=”custom” button_border_color=”custom” button_icon_color=”custom” button_bg_color_hover=”primary” font_color_hover=”custom” button_border_color_hover=”primary” button_icon_color_hover=”custom” custom_font_color=”#ffffff” custom_button_icon_color=”#ffffff” custom_font_color_hover=”#ffffff” custom_button_icon_color_hover=”#ffffff” custom_button_bg_color=”#3c3c3c” custom_button_border_color=”#3c3c3c” lg_spacing=”padding_top:15;padding_right:15;padding_bottom:15;padding_left:15″ md_spacing=”padding_top:15;padding_right:15;padding_bottom:15;padding_left:15″ sm_spacing=”padding_top:15;padding_right:15;padding_bottom:15;padding_left:15″ xs_spacing=”padding_top:15;padding_right:15;padding_bottom:15;padding_left:15″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ background_color=”custom” custom_background_color=”#ffffff” el_class=”get-involved”][tm_image full_wide=”1″ align=”center” animation=”none” image=”42746″ lg_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″ md_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″ sm_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″ xs_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1565004736327{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”]

Volunteer

We are always in need of dedicated volunteers who want to help make a difference with their hands and hearts.

[/vc_column_text][tm_button size=”sm” full_wide=”1″ button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fcare4calais.org%2Fget-involved%2F|title:Learn%20more|target:%20_blank|” animation=”none” color=”custom” button_bg_color=”custom” font_color=”custom” button_border_color=”custom” button_icon_color=”custom” button_bg_color_hover=”primary” font_color_hover=”custom” button_border_color_hover=”primary” button_icon_color_hover=”custom” custom_font_color=”#ffffff” custom_button_icon_color=”#ffffff” custom_font_color_hover=”#ffffff” custom_button_icon_color_hover=”#ffffff” custom_button_bg_color=”#3c3c3c” custom_button_border_color=”#3c3c3c” lg_spacing=”padding_top:15;padding_right:15;padding_bottom:15;padding_left:15″ md_spacing=”padding_top:15;padding_right:15;padding_bottom:15;padding_left:15″ sm_spacing=”padding_top:15;padding_right:15;padding_bottom:15;padding_left:15″ xs_spacing=”padding_top:15;padding_right:15;padding_bottom:15;padding_left:15″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ background_color=”custom” content_alignment=”center” custom_background_color=”#ffffff” el_class=”get-involved”][tm_image full_wide=”1″ align=”center” animation=”none” image=”42848″ lg_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″ md_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″ sm_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″ xs_spacing=”margin_top:0;margin_right:0;margin_bottom:0;margin_left:0;padding_top:0;padding_right:0;padding_bottom:0;padding_left:0″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1705669120944{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”]

Collect & Donate

We are always on the lookout for  people or organisations who are able to host a collection point for donations of aid.

[/vc_column_text][tm_button size=”sm” full_wide=”1″ button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fcare4calais.org%2Fget-involved%2Fcollect-donate%2F|title:Learn%20more|target:_blank” animation=”none” color=”custom” button_bg_color=”custom” font_color=”custom” button_border_color=”custom” button_icon_color=”custom” button_bg_color_hover=”primary” font_color_hover=”custom” button_border_color_hover=”primary” button_icon_color_hover=”custom” custom_font_color=”#ffffff” custom_button_icon_color=”#ffffff” custom_font_color_hover=”#ffffff” custom_button_icon_color_hover=”#ffffff” custom_button_bg_color=”#3c3c3c” custom_button_border_color=”#3c3c3c” lg_spacing=”padding_top:15;padding_right:15;padding_bottom:15;padding_left:15″ md_spacing=”padding_top:15;padding_right:15;padding_bottom:15;padding_left:15″ sm_spacing=”padding_top:15;padding_right:15;padding_bottom:15;padding_left:15″ xs_spacing=”padding_top:15;padding_right:15;padding_bottom:15;padding_left:15″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” background_color=”custom” lg_spacing=”padding_top:20;padding_bottom:20″ md_spacing=”padding_top:20;padding_bottom:20″ sm_spacing=”padding_top:20;padding_bottom:20″ xs_spacing=”padding_top:20;padding_bottom:20″ custom_background_color=”#055067″][vc_column width=”1/2″][tm_image image_size=”custom” action=”custom_link” align=”center” image=”42270″ custom_link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fcare4calais.org%2Fintegration%2F|title:Safe%20Passage|target:_blank” rounded=”6″ image_size_width=”400″ image_size_height=”400″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ lg_spacing=”padding_top:20;padding_right:20;padding_bottom:20;padding_left:20″ md_spacing=”padding_top:20;padding_right:20;padding_bottom:20;padding_left:20″ sm_spacing=”padding_top:20;padding_right:20;padding_bottom:20;padding_left:20″ xs_spacing=”padding_top:20;padding_right:20;padding_bottom:20;padding_left:20″][vc_column_text]

Integration not Segregation

We’re launching a legal challenge against the government’s segregation of asylum seekers

The accommodation at Wethersfield and on the Bibby Stockholm is a form of segregation, and it falls far short of the standards James Cleverly, the Home Secretary, is obliged by law to provide.

We’re putting the Government on notice. STOP imprisoning asylum seekers in camps and barges, and start tackling the REAL problems in the UK’s asylum system.

[/vc_column_text][tm_button button=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fcare4calais.org%2Fintegration%2F|title:Donate%20and%20share|target:_blank”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1534278089944{padding-top: 70px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” background_color=”custom” css=”.vc_custom_1534359778468{background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” lg_spacing=”padding_bottom:40″ md_spacing=”padding_bottom:14″ sm_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″ xs_spacing=”padding_bottom:20″][vc_column lg_spacing=”margin_top:20;margin_bottom:20″ md_spacing=”margin_top:20;margin_bottom:20″ sm_spacing=”margin_top:20;margin_bottom:20″ xs_spacing=”margin_top:20;margin_bottom:20″][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” animate_delay=”.2″ animate_duration=”1.6″][vc_column_text]

    Refugee Stories
    John and Bato's story
    Read more
[/vc_column_text][tm_button size=”sm” button=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fcare4calais.org%2Fnews%2F|title:All%20news||” align=”center” animation=”none” color=”custom” button_bg_color=”custom” font_color=”custom” button_border_color=”custom” button_icon_color=”custom” button_bg_color_hover=”primary” font_color_hover=”custom” button_border_color_hover=”primary” button_icon_color_hover=”custom” custom_font_color=”#ffffff” custom_button_icon_color=”#ffffff” custom_font_color_hover=”#ffffff” custom_button_icon_color_hover=”#ffffff” custom_button_bg_color=”#3c3c3c” custom_button_border_color=”#3c3c3c”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
